paper_abstract: This paper shows that for any two distinct vertices u and v with distance d in the hypercube Q(n) (n >= 3) with at most 2n - 5 faulty edges and each vertex incident with least two fault-free edges, there exist fault-free uv-paths of length l in Q(n) for every l with d + 4 <= l <= 2(n) - 1 and l - d equivalent to 0 (mod 2). This result improves some known results on edge-fault bipanconnectivity of hypercubes. The Proof is based on the recursive structure Of Q(n). (C) 2008 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
